name: Haikyuu Escape Room
description:
You end up in an escape room as part of a "team bonding exercise" with the Karasuno VBC. Will you be able to escape in time and build your own bonds with the team in the process? Test your skills and see if you have what it takes! (Currently only half the team is playable.)

All credits for character sprite art go to official Haikyuu! anime/ released art; I only edited/modified them using Paint 3D for this project. Photo credits for sources of various art assets including special items and backgrounds go to the amazing photographers at Pexels.com, Pixabay.com, Unsplash.com, and Wikipedia who provided free-to-use royalty-free or public domain content. Information about the constellations is credited to Wikipedia as well.
